description: MUST HAVE OR CREATE ACCOUNT... THIS APP IS A MEDIA PLAYER FOR www.mp3tunes.com CLOUD MEDIA SERVICE.  IT IS NOT INTENDED TO BE A STANDALONE PLAYER.  YOU EITHER NEED TO HAVE AN ACCOUNT OR CREATE ONE IN THE APP AFTER DOWNLOAD.  YOU ALSO NEED TO UPLOAD MUSIC TO THAT ACCOUNT FROM YOUR MUSIC LIBRARY.  MP3 Tunes for WebOS is your connection from your WebOS device to www.mp3tunes.com. Create your account right from the app and have your whole music collection right at your fingertips. No more need for taking up all the memory in your phone.  Create playlists, add tracks to it, search your whole collection, you can even download songs right to your phone for offline listening.  Plus you can easily manage your music and account right from www.mp3tunes.com.
